title: Fps drops after last patch.
body:
^ 
Idk why it happens. Before that patch everything worked nice. I noticed that i have fps drops ONLY in LoL, my PC and the other games still works the same. So there must be a problem League. I see not only me have that problem. Im unable to play LoL for now, cuz it drops me in random moments to 7-15fps. Rito help.

replies.body:
Framerate issues can be caused by a few different things, but they're primarily the byproduct of problematic display drivers or hardware issues. I'd like you to work through our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) since it covers the most frequent fixes for this problem.

Please let me know if that guide was unable to resolve this.
